text: The 1910 Argentine Primera División was the 19th season of top-flight football in Argentina. The season began on April 24 and ended in December. The championship was reduced from 10 to 9 teams, with each team playing the other twice.Argentina 1910 by Osvaldo Gorgazzi at RSSSF.com Gimnasia y Esgrima de Buenos Aires (promoted last year) made its debut at the top division while Argentino de Quilmes was relegated to Segunda División. Alumni won its 9th title in 11 seasons. ==Final table== ==References== Category:Argentine Primera División seasons Category:1910 in Argentine football Category:1910 in South American football
title: 1910 Argentine Primera División
